MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetPattern(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of pattern implemented by the element to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this .
Docs.returns: The object that implements the pattern interface, or if the specified pattern interface is not implemented by this peer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table describes what the GetPattern method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`:
|The value of `patternInterface`|The return value| |-------------------------------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer> that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> that contains the data item| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.|

Docs.value: The object that implements the pattern interface, or if the specified pattern interface is not implemented by this peer.
